# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that receives presentation requests from the button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Presenting Shortcut Editors

- **shortcut**: The shortcut Siri invokes when the user speaks the invocation phrase.
- **INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonDelegate**: The protocol an object implements to receive notifications from the Siri Shortcut button.
